Class Transcript

java.lang.Object
Transcript
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Transcript extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the academic transcript of a student, including information about each semester's performance.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transcript()
    Constructs an empty transcript with initial values.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSemester(Semester s)
    Adds a new semester to the transcript.
    int
    getCredits()
    Retrieves the total number of credits earned by the student.
    double
    getGpa()
    Retrieves the overall GPA of the student.
    Semester
    getSemester(int semester)
    Retrieves a specific semester from the transcript based on the semester number.
    List<Semester>
    getSemesters()
    Retrieves the list of semesters included in the transcript.
    void
    totalCredits()
    Calculates the total number of credits earned by summing the credits of all included semesters.
    void
    totalGpa()
    Calculates the overall GPA by averaging the GPAs of all included semesters.
    String
    viewTranscript()
    Generates a formatted string of the transcript, including information about each semester's performance, total GPA, and total credits earned.

  • Method Details

    • viewTranscript

      public String viewTranscript()
      Generates a formatted string of the transcript, including information about each semester's performance, total GPA, and total credits earned.
      Returns:
      The formatted string representation of the transcript.

    • totalGpa

      public void totalGpa()
      Calculates the overall GPA by averaging the GPAs of all included semesters.

    • totalCredits

      public void totalCredits()
      Calculates the total number of credits earned by summing the credits of all included semesters.

    • addSemester

      public void addSemester(Semester s)
      Adds a new semester to the transcript.
      Parameters:
      s - The semester to be added.

    • getSemesters

      public List<Semester> getSemesters()
      Retrieves the list of semesters included in the transcript.
      Returns:
      The list of semesters.

    • getSemester

      public Semester getSemester(int semester)
      Retrieves a specific semester from the transcript based on the semester number.

      semester - The semester number.
      Returns:
      The specified semester.
